rooms.description: Open space for entry and guest reception.
Spacious area with floor-to-ceiling windows to connect with the courtyard. Scandinavian minimalistic design, warm lighting.
Adjacent to living room for communal dining experiences.
Functional kitchen with ample storage and Scandinavian design elements.
Guest bathroom ensuring privacy and comfort.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows in the living area connecting with central courtyard.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom following Scandinavian aesthetics and ample natural light.
Guest bedroom designed for comfort and functionality.
